survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
hi
great! i'm at the starting point
there's a twig leading to a small island with a tiger on it to my left. where to?
go staight and then a bit to the left to go between the parrot and elephant and cross the rocks to the right
alright, i've reached the rocks and can see the frog on a new island
what's next?
cross over the alligator, and to your left a bit is a rock to cross
okay, back at the island with the elephant
what do i do now?
cross to the left
cool, i see a giraffe, now where?
cross to the right
got it, i'm next to the snake
where to from here?
staight aheas
ahead
bingo! found the treasure! *finished*
yes, i'm already at the treasure buddy
*finished*

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
hi
great, let's start! head a little to the left, going below the wooden bench and across the trail
but hey, don't get to that florist stand yet! make a quick u-turn to the left, across the trail again, and head back to our white doggie
'okay I'm there
awesome! now you need to head south, down your map
spot another white dog hanging out next to a red and white picnic setup. got it?
yes
nice! just walk over the mat, grazes that bowl of juicy berries and keep heading left
okay lol I'm at two crossing
fantastic! now cross that wooden branch over the river, but this time we are going up north
just keep pushing!
okay crossing over to the flower stand
perfect! stay clear of that green bush, circle it from the right until you get to the florist stand
okay by the bike
beautiful! now turn west, go below the stand and voila! there's a big bridge with some cyclists
let them pass and continue west too
okay over the bridge
well done! just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly folks catching up on the news on a bench
got them in sight?
I'm next to the old people
amazing, now take few steps south, right between our old chatterboxes and another wooden branch
keep going until you see a green bush next to the end of the branch
yes next to the bush
cool, now head east between the branch and the bush
keep it going!
okay where to now
see that adorable young deer a few steps ahead to your east? that's where we're headed to! say hi for me when you get there!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? empezamos el juego?
hello
hey buddy! so, i'm at the north with a tent nearby
looks like there's a fire to the south with a dog on the left and a red mushroom on the right. can you guide me on where to go next?
okay you're heading from the tent down south around the dog and between the fire stop at the mushroom for more instructions
alright, i'm by the red mushroom now
what's the next move, amigo?
get on the path and head down south more till you get to the telescope. go between the scope and the bus
gotcha! now i'm at the telescope, can see that blue car too
what's my next move, buddy?
head west and get to the cabin
okay, followed your instructions and now i'm at the house
we made it, champ! *finished*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
hi
hi
awesome, let's do this. see those three palm trees? pass under the first one, making your way to the south-west
then take a right, bypass the second palm, and before reaching the third, yank it to the left. continue south. got it?
No
oh, no worries! so, you're at the palm trees, right? go underneath the first palm tree. after that, turn right and go past the second palm tree
before you get to the third tree, take a sharp left and keep heading south. better now?
yes where by the dog
good job! next step, you're going to see a wee brown puppy
stay to its left, veer a little to the left then swing back right, heading south again
where by the ball
not there yet, buddy
before that, there are a couple of rocks and then the ocean. cross between the big rock on your left and the small one on the right till you hit the ocean
okay ocean
perfect! you'll notice a big red crab in the water, just ignore him, he's not as scary as he looks
turn right instead, let's go westwards along the big rock near you
lol okay heading to a shark
oh, no sweat! keep going until you see a medium rock, then make a sharp right turn at the sight of our shark friend
Im by the ball
great, now head back to land
you should see your medium rock and that blue-yellow-white ball. go between those two and start heading north, you're doing really well!
okay I see a speaker
nice! now, veer a bit to the left heading north-west
you should be sailing between a red tent on your left and a big speaker to your right. watch your step!
okay between a tent and canoe
great job! now, loop around the tent, kind of like an arc
okay behind tent
perfect, keep heading south now
we're almost there, so stay on course!
okay where too now
you should be now facing the red kayak and the sea, but you're not going into the water again
turn right when you're at the shore, heading west and staying below the red kayak

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
